body_html:
Now that the GPU info is on one page: https://www.tensorflow.org/install/gpu
I'd like to keep this in one place so that it's easy to update and stays in sync. There are currently sections for hardware requirements and software requirements, can we add a table there?
https://github.com/tensorflow/docs/blob/master/site/en/install/gpu.md

body:
Now that the GPU info is on one page: https://www.tensorflow.org/install/gpu
I'd like to keep this in one place so that it's easy to update and stays in sync. There are currently sections for *hardware requirements* and *software requirements*, can we add a table there?
https://github.com/tensorflow/docs/blob/master/site/en/install/gpu.md
